Text: Works great only prob is it only works to version 5.0.99

OK have used it for a while now & it works great the best email client since OE. The keygen works well but shows up as a false positive but is not infected. You have to set the HTML yourself which is not hard just open an email & on the right hand side is an icon which you click & then click box "Show Rules" then from the drom down select" Allow All". Still can not see where I can make it permanent for all.
